doc.title: E! News Daily Documentaries
doc.plot: E! News Documentaries presented a series of three critically acclaimed documentary specials hosted and Executive Produced by Ron Reagan Jr. They were: "See How They Run" a 60 minute documentary special exploring how the media covers the presidental race. "The Greatest Export" a 60 minute documentary exploring how entertainment is America's greatest export "What They Don't Want You To See" a 60 minute expose on television censorship
